text: This is a beta, get in touch with HubSpot support
How can I make a template that is set to be a home page to be my blog listing page?
There are two types of blog templates.. blog list and blog post
Look up the HubSpot boilerplate in GitHub it's a great resource on how to build themes
I downloaded the theme from Envato (katen), the home page template is the one I want to be my blog listing page. Is this the piece of code that indicates when it can be used for? `templateType: page`
I believe so. Check this page for that. templateType: blog_listing is probably what you want. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates>
Oh. Like saying “Showing results for _Search Terms_”? The parameters are in the URL so you may have to create a custom module to grab that and then parse the string to get the search terms out of it.
Is there a way to make a search bar as part of a menu? It would be the last item of a menu. Thanks.
You can take the last blank item in the sitemap and put the search HTML inside this blank list with the help of javascript. I have done this many times.
